settings.heading: How can I earn money with WilCity?
settings.description:
WilCity provides the various ways that help you can 
earn money from your site.

settings.heading: Paid Listings
settings.description: This is the big money maker of your directory site. Listing owners will pay to get their places listed on your site.

settings.heading: Promoted Listings
settings.description: You offer Promotion Plans, listing owners will have directories appeared at special spots on site, and at the top of search results page.

settings.heading: Paid Claim Listings
settings.description: Another revenue model to monetize from listing. You create a listing on your site and allow the business owner to claim it.

settings.heading: Trusted by over 30000+ users
settings.description: Here is what some of them have to say about Wiloke

testimonials.name: Mark Alexander
testimonials.testimonial: Life before WilCity was very chaotic - we got a lot of phone calls, a lot of mistyped orders. So with WilCity, the ability to see the order directly from the customer makes it so streamlined.

testimonials.name: Randy Robinson
testimonials.testimonial: We’ve increased our sales from 20–35% since we’ve implemented WilCity and would never look back.
